divs: sighting detailson monday night about 8:oo pm i stepped outside to smoke a cigarette and noticed the large, bright light in the western sky. an airplane flew above it and it appeared to rotate slowly, following the plane's movement. my parents (ages 56 & 57)and my 2 children (ages 6 & 8) also observed the lights\object while standing outside and from inside the house. it hovered in the sky, with lights changing colors from white to red to orange to yellow, etc...randomly. looking through binoculars, i could not identify a distinct object, although the light pattern looked like the shape of a cross. after an hour or so, the object slowly moved west and was out of sight. the following evening, the light\object appeared in the same spot as the night before, and about the same time. again, after about an hour of hovering, it disappeared in a westerly direction. but, this time it re-appeared about 11pm and disappeared again about 15 minutes later.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Geneseo
There were no other sightings in Geneseo on or around February 6th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: bright lights hovering in sky for an hour then travels to west & disappears
